name: Benedict Robe, Brown
description: A far cry from any other typical monk robe, this cotton robe is very light and and a deep woven texture resembling burlap. This long loose fitting coat can be worn from warrior to priest alike and does not suffer the typical class restriction of a cleric or monk.  A simple attire that can conceal and protect without making you poor.

name: Benedict Robe, Dryad Green
description: The Dryad Green benedict robe is an all-purpose costume that can either be worn open or closed to suit your Larp character’s needs. It is made from a heavy textured cotton fabric and has very long and wide sleeves that allows you to wear it over certain types of armor.

name: Godfrey Pourpoint, Dark Red
description: The Dark Red Godfrey Pourpoint is a form fitting coat made from a durable heavy cotton canvas and can be worn as padding under armor. This doublet can be worn as a vest because of its detachable arms.  This rich colored jacket is a fashionable piece that will embellish any Larp costume.

name: Azog Robe, Black
description: The Azog Black Robe is basically a used version of the Benedictine robe used by the penniless or creatures seeking concealment  . The flayed and worn edges are symbolic of the hardship of medieval life, but beware of appearances, they sometimes are used hide objects of value.

name: Hellsing Coat, Brown
description: Epic Armoury’s Brown Coat Hellsing is a stunning long-sleeved duster with personalizable mantle appropriate for witch hunters . Protecting from the collar to the mid-calf , this coat can provide shielding from you from the elements while adding a menacing , more professional look ....

name: Hellsing Coat, Black
description: Epic Armoury’s Black Coat Hellsing is an attractive long-sleeved duster with customizable mantle suitable for witch hunters. Covering from the neck to the mid-calf , this coat offers protection from you from the elements while adding a sinister, more specialized appearance. The collar can be removed and the coat can be worn open allowing for multiple...

name: Wizard Robe, Black and Gold
description: The wizard robe in made in black cotton velour and has a fine matt surface.  A antique gold polyester edging on the hood, front, bottom and sleeves embellish this already striking robe. The Wizard Robe model is a classic model, as they are known and worn in academies and towers in every realm. The front has four golden buttons with chains that hold the...

name: Magician Robe, Gold
description: Every fantasy magician need a robe, it is part of what helps his hold his spells and conceals his true powers. This mystical robe is adorned by a gold polyester satin trim and reaches mid-calf. This robe will fit a wide range of mystical characters.

name: Magician Robe, Maroon
description: Any spell caster can use this awesome magician robe with satin polyester maroon trim.  Add a little mystery to your character with this cool three quarter length hooded robe. Prepare to fell the magic and power of the robe!

name: Magician Robe, Silver
description: Excellent for casting spells, this dramatic magician robe has an embellishing polyester satin trim that can be worn open or closed using a belt. This black robe will fit a wide range of magical characters.

name: Wizard Robe, Black and Red
description: The wizard robe in made in black cotton velour and has a fine matt surface.  A red polyester edging on the hood, front, bottom and sleeves embellish this already striking robe. The Wizard Robe model is a classic model, as they are known and worn in academies and towers in every realm. The front has four golden buttons with chains that hold the cloak...

name: Azog Robe, Brown
description: The Azog brown Robe is a tattered version of the Benedictine robe, ideal for either a peasant or an orc. The flayed and worn edges are symbolic of the hardship of medieval life, but beware of appearances, they sometimes are used to conceal identities and objects of value.

name: Benedict Robe, Dark Red
description: The unique red color of this monk's robe makes you stand out in a crowd but does not leave you exposed to the elements. Regardless of its rough texture it  has a nice soft feel and warmth to it. The long ample arms and wide opening down the front allows for a free range of movement and only makes your character ever more effective.

name: Benedict Robe, Black
description: Usually rather plain, this simple and comfortable monk robe is rather quite stylish. A simple tie system of leather and laces near the collar allows the wearer to easily draw his concealed weapon and can be closed by wearing a simple belt. Resembling a long tunic, the appeal of this priests robe lies in the versatility of this coat while keeping your...

name: Godfrey Pourpoint, Black
description: The black Godfrey pourpoint is a form fitting coat made from a durable heavy cotton canvas and comes with detachable arms. This doublet will give you the elegance that any warrior would envy while giving you the protection you need during battle.
